text: "Hold On" is a song recorded by Swedish singer Måns Zelmerlöw. It was released on 18 May 2009 as a digital download in Sweden. It was released as the second (third overall) single from his second studio album MZW (2009). The song was written by David Clewett, Jason Gill and Måns Zelmerlöw. It peaked to number 22 on the Swedish Singles Chart. ==Track listing== ==Chart performance== ===Weekly charts=== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" |- ! Chart (2009) !
